name: Claim presence/stance annotation app
description: Expert-based annotation app for claim presence and stance annotation

name: Update sentence embedding annotations task
description: Creates sentence embedding annotations for articles and claims.

name: Claim-stance detection method
description: Detects article stance to a claim

name: Fact-checking article to claim transformation method
description: Transforms fact-checking articles to claims with unification of ratings

name: Expert-based source reliability evaluation
description: Validates source reliability by employing expert-based evaluation provided by Media Bias Fact Check, OpenSources, etc.

name: Claim-presence detection method (IR and NN approach)
description: Detects claim presence in articles by employing NN (sentence-embedding) and information retrieval techniques.

name: Article veracity aggregation method
description: Aggregates article - claim mappings and derives final article veracity
